pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, February 21, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

York Region, Ontario

5:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall with members of the Carpenters’ District Council of Ontario.

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 4:30 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
